page.title: 19TRANSPORT
page.content: In Rodley,Upper Framilode and Framilode we saw in the space of two hours eight cars,one milk float,one egg lorry and three tractors on the roads.The area we are covering is rural so there was more transport for the farms as opposed to town use.Other transport seen was a Land Rover,four lorries,one motor bike and a bulldozer parked off the road. So far as{public transport}is concerned there is a{bus service}once a day every Wednesday and Friday and a school bus to the local school every day.
